NAEB RADIO NETWORK
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
TO: ALL NAEB RADIO NETWORK STATIONS
FROM: NETWORK MANAGER
RE: PROGRAM OFFERING FOR THE 2ND QUARTER, 1957 (ISSUES 14-26)
DEADLINE FOR ORDERS: MARCH 4. 1957
Attached hereto is the offering for the period April-June, 1957* We trust the
variety of the series will appeal to all stations.
Once again let us remind you that late orders will be honored only if the ordering
station agrees to pay $2.00 per reel for any back programs desired; otherwise
service on back orders will begin with the issue then being shipped.
With this offering we have again made available some nbonus” series. To obtain a
•’bonus" series, it is necessary that you substitute it for an equal number of
minutes from the "basic" or regular offering. The total times for all series
are given on the order blank. Remember, you may take as many bonus series as
you wish provided the proper substitution is made.
If there are any questions concerning the above announcements or the offering in
general, please feel free to contact the Network Manager for details. As in the
past, supplements to this offering will appear containing additional information
on various series.
Best regards to all from the Network staff. We would be pleased to receive any
comments either you or your listeners have regarding Network programs.
1/30/57
